name: Firefox Make Urlbar Font Size Bigger
description:
For Firefox 3.6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

Makes Firefox Urlbar Font Size Bigger without distorting the Navigation Toolbar and Toolbar buttons.

Works well with "LeftSideStar" extension:
https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/leftsidestar

Also works well with userstyles:

style 51379

style 49786

Tested on Firefox 3.6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
